TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProgressBar extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示 Windows 进度栏控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows progress bar control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个控件以可视方式指示在三种样式的一个较长的操作的进度：A control visually indicates the progress of a lengthy operation in one of three styles: - 从左到右的步骤中增加分段的块。Segmented blocks that increase in steps from left to right. - 填充的从左到右连续栏。A continuous bar that fills in from left to right. - 在滚动一个块以字幕方式。A block that scrolls across a in a marquee fashion. 属性确定的样式显示。The property determines the style of that is displayed. 请注意，控件只能是水平方向。Note that the control can only be oriented horizontally. 有关如何创建垂直方向的示例，请参阅类。For an example of how to create a vertically oriented , see the class. 控件通常用于当应用程序执行任务，例如将文件复制或打印文档。The control is typically used when an application performs tasks such as copying files or printing documents. 应用程序的用户可能会考虑应用程序无响应，如果没有视觉提示。Users of an application might consider an application unresponsive if there is no visual cue. 通过使用中应用程序中，可以警告用户该应用程序正在执行一个大型任务和应用程序是否仍然响应。By using the in your application, you alert the user that the application is performing a lengthy task and that the application is still responding. 和属性定义的值来表示任务的进度的范围。The and properties define the range of values to represent the progress of a task. 属性通常设置为值为 0，和属性通常设置为一个值，该值指示任务完成。The property is typically set to a value of 0, and the property is typically set to a value indicating the completion of a task. 例如，若要复制的文件，一组时正确显示进度属性可以设置为的文件总数，要复制。For example, to properly display the progress when copying a group of files, the property could be set to the total number of files to be copied. 属性表示应用程序已完成该操作方面的进度。The property represents the progress that the application has made toward completing the operation. 显示的值仅仅是近似于的当前值属性。The value displayed by the only approximates the current value of the property. 基于大小，则属性确定何时显示下一个块，或增加栏的大小。Based on the size of the , the property determines when to display the next block or increase the size of the bar. 有多种方法来修改显示的值而不更改直接属性。There are a number of ways to modify the value displayed by the other than changing the property directly. 可以使用属性来指定特定值要递增by 属性，然后调用方法的值增加。You can use the property to specify a specific value to increment the property by, and then call the method to increment the value. 若要改变的增量值，可以使用方法并指定具有要递增的值属性。To vary the increment value, you can use the method and specify a value with which to increment the property. > [!NOTE] > 并更改为在中启用视觉样式时不会采用[!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)]及更高版本。 and changes for the will not be honored when visual styles are enabled on [!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)] and above. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用控件来显示文件复制操作的进度。The following code example uses a control to display the progress of a file copy operation. 该示例使用并属性，以指定的范围，等效于要复制的文件数。The example uses the and properties to specify a range for the that is equivalent to the number of files to copy. 该代码还使用具有属性方法的值增加如复制文件。The code also uses the property with the method to increment the value of the as a file is copied. 此示例要求具有创建名为控件`pBar1`中创建，并且没有一种方法创建名为`CopyFile`（返回布尔值，该值指示文件复制操作已已成功完成），它执行文件复制操作。This example requires that you have a control created called `pBar1` that is created within a and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation. 该代码还需要创建并传递给包含要复制的文件的字符串数组`CopyWithProgress`方法在示例中定义，并从另一个方法或事件中的调用该方法。The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example and that the method is called from another method or event in the . [!code-cpp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Increment(int32 value) cil managed

param.name: value
param.span: 增加进度栏的当前位置所根据的数量。

span.span: The amount by which to increment the progress bar's current position.

summary.span: 按指定的数量增加进度栏的当前位置。

span.span: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the specified amount.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使你可以按特定数量增加进度栏的值。The method enables you to increment the value of the progress bar by a specific amount. 此方法的递增进度条是类似于使用具有属性方法。This method of incrementing the progress bar is similar to using the property with the method. 属性指定的当前位置。The property specifies the current position of the . 如果在调用方法，属性大于的值属性，属性的值保持为属性。If, after calling the method, the property is greater than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 调用后的，如果方法中指定一个负值`value`参数，属性小于的值属性，属性保持为的值属性。If, after calling the method with a negative value specified in the `value` parameter, the property is less than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 因为对象的样式设置为而不是一个连续滚动条将显示其，则调用是不必要的并将引发。Because a object whose style is set to displays a continuously scrolling bar instead of its , calling is unnecessary and will raise an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法和属性值的增加中的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method and the property to increment the value of a in the event of a . 此示例还显示中的属性提供的文本表示形式。The example also displays the property in a to provide a textual representation of the . 此示例要求具有控件，名为`progressBar1`，和一个控件，其中包含名为`statusBarPanel1`。This example requires that you have a control, named `progressBar1`, and a control that contains a , named `statusBarPanel1`. 名为`time`，必须添加到窗体作为成员。The , named `time`, must be added to the form as a member. [!code-cpp[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/VB/form1.vb#1)]

member this.MarqueeAnimationSpeed : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置进度块在进度栏内滚动所用的时间段，以毫秒为单位。

span.span: Gets or sets the time period, in milliseconds, that it takes the progress block to scroll across the progress bar.

value.span: 进度块在进度栏内滚动所用的时间段，以毫秒为单位。

span.span: The time period, in milliseconds, that it takes the progress block to scroll across the progress bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字幕样式进度指示器不会显示进度;相反，它表示通过将进度块在进度栏内移动正在进行操作。A marquee-style progress indicator does not display progress; instead it indicates that an operation is occurring by moving the progress block across the progress bar. 由于字幕动画速度是一个时间段，将值设置为较高数字将导致较慢的速度和较低数字将导致更快的速度。Since the marquee animation speed is a time period, setting the value to a higher number results in a slower speed and a lower number results in a faster speed.

span.span: The indicated time period is less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Maximum { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Maximum : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置控件范围的最大值。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum value of the range of the control.
The maximum value of the range.
The default is 100.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定的上限属性。This property specifies the upper limit of the property. 时的值更改属性时，重绘控件以反映新的控制范围。When the value of the property is changed, the control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control. 时的值属性等于的值完全填充属性，进度栏。When the value of the property is equal to the value of the property, the progress bar is completely filled. 可以使用此属性指定为值属性必须设置 (通过设置属性或使用或方法) 来指示操作已完成。You can use this property to specify a value to which the property must be set (by setting the property or using the or methods) to indicate that an operation is complete. 例如，可以设置的值属性设置为的文件复制操作中的文件总数。For example, you can set the value of the property to the total number of files in a file copy operation. 每次复制一个文件时，属性可以加 1，直到复制的文件总数。Each time a file is copied, the property can be increased by 1 until the total number of files is copied. 此时，将完全填充进度栏。At that point, the progress bar would be completely filled. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用控件来显示文件复制操作的进度。The following code example uses a control to display the progress of a file copy operation. 该示例使用并属性，以指定的范围，等效于要复制的文件数。The example uses the and properties to specify a range for the that is equivalent to the number of files to copy. 该代码还使用具有属性方法的值增加如复制文件。The code also uses the property with the method to increment the value of the as a file is copied. 此示例要求具有创建名为控件`pBar1`中创建，并且没有一种方法创建名为`CopyFile`（返回布尔值，该值指示文件复制操作已已成功完成），它执行文件复制操作。This example requires that you have a control created called `pBar1` that is created within a and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation. 该代码还需要创建并传递给包含要复制的文件的字符串数组`CopyWithProgress`方法在示例中定义，并从另一个方法或事件中的调用该方法。The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example and that the method is called from another method or event in the . [!code-cpp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: The value specified is less than 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定的下限属性。This property specifies the lower limit of the property. 时的值更改属性时，重绘控件以反映新的控制范围。When the value of the property is changed, the control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control. 时的值属性等于的值属性，进度条为空。When the value of the property is equal to the value of the property, the progress bar is empty. 若要更改进度条的值，请使用具有属性方法，请使用方法，或设置值的直接属性。To change the value of the progress bar, use the property with the method, use the method, or set the value of the property directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用控件来显示文件复制操作的进度。The following code example uses a control to display the progress of a file copy operation. 该示例使用并属性，以指定的范围，等效于要复制的文件数。The example uses the and properties to specify a range for the that is equivalent to the number of files to copy. 该代码还使用具有属性方法的值增加如复制文件。The code also uses the property with the method to increment the value of the as a file is copied. 此示例要求具有创建名为控件`pBar1`中创建，并且没有一种方法创建名为`CopyFile`（返回布尔值，该值指示文件复制操作已已成功完成），它执行文件复制操作。This example requires that you have a control created called `pBar1` that is created within a , and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation. 该代码还需要创建并传递给包含要复制的文件的字符串数组`CopyWithProgress`方法定义在示例中，并从另一个方法或事件中的调用该方法。The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example, and that the method is called from another method or event in the . [!code-cpp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseDoubleClick As MouseEventHandler

summary.span: 当用户双击控件时发生。

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PerformStep() cil managed

summary.span: 按照 属性的数量增加进度栏的当前位置。

span.span: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the amount of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通过指定的数量增加进度条的值属性。The method increments the value of the progress bar by the amount specified by the property. 可以使用属性来指定在操作中的每个已完成的任务进度条的值更改量。You can use the property to specify the amount that each completed task in an operation changes the value of the progress bar. 例如，如果要复制的一组文件，你可能想要设置的值属性设置为 1 和的值属性设置为要复制的文件总数。For example, if you are copying a group of files, you might want to set the value of the property to 1 and the value of the property to the total number of files to copy. 每个文件复制时，可以调用方法的值增加进度栏属性。When each file is copied, you can call the method to increment the progress bar by the value of the property. 如果你想要更灵活地控制的进度条的值，则可以使用方法或设置值的直接属性。If you want to have more flexible control of the value of the progress bar, you can use the method or set the value of the property directly. 属性指定的当前位置。The property specifies the current position of the . 如果在调用方法，属性大于的值属性，属性的值保持为属性。If, after calling the method, the property is greater than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 如果，在调用方法使用负值中指定，则属性小于的值属性，属性的值保持为属性.If, after calling the method with a negative value specified in , the property is less than the value of the property, the property remains at the value of the property. 因为对象的样式设置为而不是一个连续滚动条将显示其，则调用是不必要的并将引发。Because a object whose style is set to displays a continuously scrolling bar instead of its , calling is unnecessary and will raise an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用控件来显示文件复制操作的进度。The following code example uses a control to display the progress of a file copy operation. 该示例使用并属性，以指定的范围，等效于要复制的文件数。The example uses the and properties to specify a range for the that is equivalent to the number of files to copy. 该代码还使用具有属性方法的值增加如复制文件。The code also uses the property with the method to increment the value of the as a file is copied. 此示例要求具有创建名为控件`pBar1`中创建，并且没有一种方法创建名为`CopyFile`（返回布尔值，该值指示文件复制操作已已成功完成），它执行文件复制操作。This example requires that you have a control created called `pBar1` that is created within a , and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation. 该代码还需要创建并传递给包含要复制的文件的字符串数组`CopyWithProgress`方法定义在示例中，并从另一个方法或事件中的调用该方法。The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example, and that the method is called from another method or event in the . [!code-cpp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ProgressBar1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ProgressBar1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#519](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#519)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#519](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#519)]

summary.span: 获取或设置调用 方法增加进度栏的当前位置时所根据的数量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount by which a call to the method increases the current position of the progress bar.

value.span: 每次调用 方法增加进度栏时所根据的数量。

span.span: The amount by which to increment the progress bar with each call to the method.
The default is 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用属性来指定在操作中的每个已完成的任务进度条的值更改量。You can use the property to specify the amount that each completed task in an operation changes the value of the progress bar. 例如，如果要复制的一组文件，你可能想要设置的值属性设置为 1 和的值属性设置为要复制的文件总数。For example, if you are copying a group of files, you might want to set the value of the property to 1 and the value of the property to the total number of files to copy. 每个文件复制时，可以调用方法的值增加进度栏属性。When each file is copied, you can call the method to increment the progress bar by the value of the property. 如果你想要更灵活地控制的进度条的值，则可以使用方法或设置值的直接属性。If you want to have more flexible control of the value of the progress bar, you can use the method or set the value of the property directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用控件来显示文件复制操作的进度。The following code example uses a control to display the progress of a file copy operation. 该示例使用并属性，以指定的范围，等效于要复制的文件数。The example uses the and properties to specify a range for the that is equivalent to the number of files to copy. 该代码还使用具有属性方法的值增加如复制文件。The code also uses the property with the method to increment the value of the as a file is copied. 此示例要求具有创建名为控件`pBar1`中创建，并且没有一种方法创建名为`CopyFile`（返回布尔值，该值指示文件复制操作已已成功完成），它执行文件复制操作。This example requires that you have a control created called `pBar1` that is created within a , and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation. 该代码还需要创建并传递给包含要复制的文件的字符串数组`CopyWithProgress`方法定义在示例中，并从另一个方法或事件中的调用该方法。The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example, and that the method is called from another method or event in the . [!code-cpp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBarOverview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBarOverview/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您需要指示操作正在进行，而不需要指示进度的数量时，可以使用字幕样式。You can use the marquee style when you need to indicate progress is being made, without indicating the quantity of progress. 样式仅当启用了可视样式时才有效。The style is honored only when visual styles are enabled. 样式未启用视觉样式时才有效。The style is honored when visual styles are not enabled.

summary.span: 获取或设置进度栏的当前位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the current position of the progress bar.
The position within the range of the progress bar.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最小和最大值通过指定属性和属性。The minimum and maximum values of the property are specified by the and properties. 可以使用此属性要递增或递减的进度栏直接的值。This property enables you to increment or decrement the value of the progress bar directly. 若要执行的值中的一致增加可以使用的控件具有属性方法。To perform consistent increases in the value of the control you can use the property with the method. 若要通过不同数量增加进度栏值，请使用方法。To increase the progress bar value by varying amounts, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法和属性值的增加中的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method and the property to increment the value of a in the event of a . 此示例还显示中的属性提供的文本表示形式。The example also displays the property in a to provide a textual representation of the . 此示例要求具有控件，名为`progressBar1`，和一个控件，其中包含名为`statusBarPanel1`。This example requires that you have a control, named `progressBar1`, and a control that contains a , named `statusBarPanel1`. 名为`time`，必须添加到窗体作为成员。The , named `time`, must be added to the form as a member. [!code-cpp[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ProgressBar.Increment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ProgressBar.Increment/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定的值大于 属性的值。

-or-

span.span: The value specified is less than the value of the property.
